track.name: Standing Around Crying
comments: when you go to the cross road you sound like muddy-an you may say water.......
when you play the blues,you have to thank of muddy waters.....
I noticed that Muddy Waters use same material to more than 1 songs. You can clearly hear the Honey Bee riff  played slower.

i remember being all drunk and my brother took me past his house in westmont-i thought he was screwing with me- Muddy Waters in westmont, whats he doing living here? i said-well-he has to live some where was the reply(my brother lived in westmont too)-i was expecting a plaque or something, but no-it was just the house that Muddy lived in-amazing
